title: Rahu Transit in the 12th House for Cancer Ascendant
summary: Rahu transiting your twelfth house draws attention toward isolation, hidden patterns, foreign connections, and subconscious fears. You may feel pulled toward solitude, overseas matters, or behind-the-scenes pursuits. Expenses can rise unexpectedly, especially around health, travel, or escapist habits, demanding conscious control. This transit blurs boundaries between reality and imagination, making grounding essential. When handled with awareness, Rahu here supports deep psychological release, spiritual exploration, and freedom from old limitations.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Strong pull toward solitude and withdrawal.

sections.heading: Career
points: Foreign or remote work opportunities arise.
Creative or spiritual fields attract interest.
Visibility reduces but strategic depth increases.

closing: Rahu in the 12th house dissolves old boundaries. Awareness turns isolation into liberation and loss into inner freedom.
